elements.caption: In this instance, all parameters for controlling a Sony TV are stored. The description of the individual parameters can be found in the documentation.

items.caption: If the status variables are to be updated automatically, please enter an interval in seconds (0 = no update).

items.name: WriteLogInformationToIPSLogger
items.caption: Log and Error Information are written to the logfile of IPSLibrary instead of standard logfile

items.name: WriteDebugInformationToLogfile
items.caption: Debug information are written additionally to standard logfile

items.name: WriteDebugInformationToIPSLogger
items.caption: Debug information are written additionally to the logfile of IPSLibrary

actions.caption: With 'Update status variables', the variables can be updated once regardless of the set interval.
Update status variables
actions.onClick: $module = new IPSModule($id); if (STV_UpdateAll($id)){echo $module->Translate('OK');} else {echo $module->Translate('Error while updating.');}

actions.caption: With 'Update application list' the installed apps are read in again.
Update application list
actions.onClick: $module = new IPSModule($id); if (IPS_RequestAction($id, 'UpdateApplicationList', 0)){echo $module->Translate('OK');} else {echo $module->Translate('Error while updating.');}

actions.caption: With 'Update Input Source list' the available Input Sources are read in again.
Update Input Source list
actions.onClick: $module = new IPSModule($id); if (IPS_RequestAction($id, 'GetSourceListInfo', 0)){echo $module->Translate('OK');} else {echo $module->Translate('Error while updating.');}

actions.caption: With 'Create file with API information' a support file is created in the IP-Symcon log directory. It contains a list of all functions supported by the TV set.
Create file with API information
actions.onClick: $module = new IPSModule($id); if (STV_WriteAPIInformationToFile($id, '')){echo $module->Translate('OK');} else {echo $module->Translate('Error writing the file.');}

status.caption: IP address can not be empty.
